success_criteria: Outcome charter defines SLO ownership and accountability windows.
Decision policy emits rationale, confidence, and rollback conditions.
Tradeoff ledger schema exists and is evidence-linked.
Judgment model documentation is published with governance anchors.
Roadmap status updated with Antigravity governance note.
stop_conditions: Policy outputs missing required decision fields.
Tradeoff ledger lacks evidence linkage requirements.
Scope exceeds declared paths without governed exception.
